title: mx12.levins
author: mx12.levins

content: Jungle of Bitcoin: A Unique Artistic ExpressionThe frame is going to be different, but the canvas is framed.Auction Start Time: NowAuction End Time: 000,000(The auction block end time will be determined by how fast the oil paint dries. Stay tuned)Bitcoin Block Number: 000,000  TXid : 00000000000000000004bfe3c4c4bd089e0558sa21000t000o21s000h000i00Timestamp â€Ž2130-09-05 23:14+ SHIPPING (+120$ (USA)), (+65$(EU)) *(Escrow available, mj) Bitcoin: 3PUuR2cPPaQiihH5Zcrw4DhdqZ72ZHeCVTBitcoin Lightning: nastyrisk78@walletofsatoshi.comSniping:  sniping. 1 Bitcoin block standard sniping rule... https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5277761.0_________________________________________________Bid Format:  BTCStarting Bid: 0.02 BTC == 2,000,000 sats[/s]Bidder:Bidder:Bidder:Bidder:Bidder:Winner Satoshi Nakamoto   with  2,000,000 satoshi BTC  _________________________________________________Sale price: 0.03912 BTC or 3,912,000 sats_______________________________________________ðŸŽ¨ Special Artwork: ARTWORK: Oil painting "Jungle of Bitcoin" mx12.artLot 1:Oil painting ARTWORK SIZE:60 x 80.5 cm (23.6 x 31.7 inches) x 20 mmFRAME OUTER DIMENSIONS:71.6 x 92.1 cm (28.2 x 36.3 inches)Jungle of Bitcoin - 1/1In this captivating artwork, you won't find the typical Bitcoin logo, but that's by design. This piece is a visual symphony that speaks volumes about the world of Bitcoin without the need for explicit symbols. It begs the question: Was the Bitcoin logo ever here? The answer lies in the intricate details, the playful incorporation of a smiley, and the jungle-like strokes that echo the untamed nature of Bitcoin.This painting is all about Bitcoin, but it challenges you to look beyond the obvious. What is it that reminds you of Bitcoin? Share your interpretation in the comments below and join the conversation about this remarkable piece of art.__________________________________________________________________________________________________Feel Free to visit Mx12Art Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Exciting news, everyone! 'Jungle of Bitcoin' reveals more with time â€“ a handmade frame, an upcoming AR layer, and a hidden Opendime. My third oil painting marks a historic moment.I've also informed some via NOSTR that they can place bids through me. Join in and be part of the journey!

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Hey, it seems there are no bids so far, but who knowsâ€”maybe soon! Let me set the auction end time for this weekend, guys. Stay tuned!

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Hey everyone, another auction here with no bids. Seems like we're short on oil painting fans.Fun fact, I've sold all my 1 of 1 paintings to a collectors, and this is the last one at home. It's winter, Christmas vibes, so feel free to make an offer. We'll work something out, no way to go wrong. Don't hesitate to ask, drop a comment or DM!

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Let me bring this post and artwork up again in this category. This was an interesting project where I cut a lot of material from Liberty Magazine and my own Bitcoin-only magazine. In the end, I decided to go over it with a palette knife and oils. This is the result ðŸ˜„ It was a lot of fun, and if I recall correctly, this is my third oil painting with mixed media. I've decided to share it once more so that some of you can make offers before I decide what to do with it. I don't think I'll be keeping this artwork in my place any longer.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Okay, I have set a price for this artwork. If it is not sold by May 9th, the artwork will be available at the Bitcoin citadel event in Hanover from May 9th to May 12th.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: I have added some new photos of this artwork, using mixed techniques and oil colors.
